name: Healthy Survivor
description:
A few months ago, I had a dream about an RPG where your HP bar got longer the more you level up. Pretty normal! But the HP bar went off the screen, and wrapped in again at weird angles.

I woke myself up when I spoke to an NPC with my HUD full of health bars, and they screamed "WHY ARE YOU SO HEALTHY!?"

I figured I'd make this silly little prototype as a kind of uhh, interactive dream record. 

Is it any good? Not really. 

Is it a lazy clone of Magic/Vampire Survivor? Yeah it's pretty close 😔😔😔
